post.title: iphone4 16gb- fido
post.content: got a iphone 4 16gb locked to fido. used for a month but it's in 10/10 condition. screen protector and case from day 1. never dropped. looking to trade it for a phone that's on its level. you add cash depending on which phone . will also take cash. comes with a griffin case and also another heavy duty case, box and everything. also have recipt. looking for a torch or somthing around that level
